Articles.Content: For windows 10. do I just make a new folder, then move KSP to it. I would like a clean Install For 1.1 Thanks for the help

Yes you can do that, I did it as well with 1.0.4 and 1.0.5. But for me the game didnt work in the program files folder so maybe you want a different location. With me the game is in my google drive folder so i can acces it from my laptop and pc. Works fine
